page.title: 11Our Area's News
page.content: We studied our local newspaper,{The {Evening Post,}for a period of a fortnight beginning April 29th.There were three main stories during this period.The first was all about the local County Council Elections. Three Labour councillors were elected for our ward which is called the Penderry Ward.They are John Allison, Tom Jones and Gwylfa Thomas. County Councillor John Allison is also leader of the {Labour Party}in West Glamorgan while the Councillor Gwylfa Thomas has become chairman of{West Glamorgan {County Council.}The other two stories both told of vandalism and roaming cows and horses.Vandals have damaged farm fences allowing animals to wander. Cows and horses then frighten old people and cause damage to peoples' gardens.
